EmailTemplate.name: Entitlement Update Approval
EmailTemplate.Body:
$launcher requested changes on $summaryName.
Login and view your work item inbox to complete this approval.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying approvers of a new entitlement update. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Changes requested for $summaryName needs approval
